reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

description.narrative: Il contributo è finalizzato a supportare le attività promosse dell'OIM nel campo delle coperazione e delle migrazioni e per supportare lo studio sulle cause migraizone e sviluppo. Lo stanziamento dei fondi a specifiche iniziative verrà deciso dando un ruolo importante alla diaspora nel processo di sviluppo dei paesi di origine.

Voluntary contribution to the activities that IOM implements for the promotion of international cooperation on migration and the analysis of the links between migration and development. The allocation of funds to specific initiatives will be jointly established, with particular attention to the role of diasporas in development processes.

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
IOM - ORGANIZZAZIONE INTERNAZIONALE PER LE MIGRAZIONI

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

tag.narrative: By 2030, reduce to less than 3 per cent the transaction costs of migrant remittances and eliminate remittance corridors with costs higher than 5 per cent
Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships
Facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, including through the implementation of planned and well-managed migration policies
Reduce inequality within and among countries
Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
